title: PLEASE ID this font :)
content:
if you want to see the complete image here’s the URL

comments.content:
Melanie,  
Try Chainlink Bold:  
 [http://www.free-fonts-ttf.org/true-type-fonts/chainlink-bold-1511-downlo...](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020540/http:/www.free-fonts-ttf.org/true-type-fonts/chainlink-bold-1511-download.htm "http://www.free-fonts-ttf.org/true-type-fonts/chainlink-bold-1511-download.htm")

It’s not perfect, but it’s pretty close.

—  
Jean Ly  
Quantum Signs & Graphics
Looks like Century Schoolbook for “White Women....”
yeah it’s a segregation sign :( century schoolbook is probably about as close as i will get
